commit.message:
locale.cc: Match orderings for static members.


2000-11-02  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@purist.soma.redhat.com>

	* src/locale.cc: Match orderings for static members.
	* include/bits/fstream.tcc: Fixes for cin.
